[File: aptos-core/dkg/src/counters.rs] [Line: 16-23: DKG_STAGE_SECONDS histogram] [Memory exhaustion] Does DKG_STAGE_SECONDS histogram have bounded sample storage, or can long-running DKG sessions accumulate unlimited samples causing memory exhaustion on validator nodes? (Medium)
